'''2.4.57''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on May 5, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Various availability updates.
* Improved file distribution.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug related to launcher button animation.
* Fixed a bug related to account mismatch warnings.
* {{bug|MCL-23150}} - One of the system requirement strings is used across multiple pages in the Minecraft Launcher limiting its translatability.
* {{bug|MCL-23322}} - Minecraft Legends "Play" button glitches out during Piglin animation.</onlyinclude>
